**Top Line:** In recent news, Secaucus experienced a chaotic street takeover, while former NYC mayor Rudy Giuliani was hospitalized after a car crash; additionally, three men were injured in a shooting in Manhattan, and a judge temporarily blocked the removal of Guatemalan children amid ongoing immigration debates.
